title: Correct a Folio Posting Error
description: A front desk agent accidentally posts a restaurant charge to the wrong room.

tasks.description: The agent identifies the error after the guest from the wrong room calls to dispute the charge.
The agent reverses the incorrect charge from the first guest's folio.
The agent posts the charge to the correct guest's folio and adds a note explaining the correction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The charge is moved to the correct room, and the action is documented.
